Testimonials

We've worked with Alex many times over the last few years, both on advertising projects and games. She is not only reliable, but a fantastic, natural sounding voice who brings so much life and energy to her characters.

Highly recommended.

The East Wing Studios

Clients have sung her praises for the projects she has appeared on, an absolute pleasure to work with.
